meta.content: COVID-19 Response - WA Charter Schools Association
Join us on May 1 at 12 pm (PDT) for a free webinar to learn how charter public schools are providing high-quality distance learning during COVID-19. Register here.

body.class: page-template page-template-template-aspiring-leaders template-aspiring-leaders page page-id-13993 wp-embed-responsive covid-19-response app-data index-data singular-data page-data page-13993-data page-covid-19-response-data template-aspiring-leaders-data

div.p: See our COVID-19 response for information about school closures and 2020 enrollment.

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-13993 current_page_item menu-item-14034 active
menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-13993 current_page_item menu-item-14034 active

div.class: featured-text d-flex align-items-center px-0 position-relative h-100

div.p: Join us on May 1 at 12 pm (PDT) for a free webinar to learn how charter public schools are providing high-quality distance learning during COVID-19. Register here.
Washington’s charter public schools – like all public schools – are working diligently to ensure our community is supported during the COVID-19 crisis.

div.class: col-lg-5 ml-sm-auto mt-5 mt-lg-0 px-0 px-lg-3 text-center text-lg-left

div.p: COVID-19 is an unprecedented crisis. Our community is coming together to offer help and resources. See our regularly updated resources page for information on at-home learning, childcare and nutrition support, response funds, and ways you can help.

This crisis demands an immediate response to ensure schools can continue to provide innovative, effective education to systemically underserved students – at a distance. A gift to our COVID-19 response will help ensure that students can keep learning.

div.class: col-lg-6 ml-sm-auto mt-3 mb-5 mb-lg-0 mt-lg-0 px-lg-0 susiyo-content-right text-center text-lg-left
